Came here for the kids Halloween PARTY AND WASNT WORTH IT AT ALL . The crowd showed a lot of racism and it was definitely a party for Spanish family‚Äôs. Another mixed parent asked can they speak English as well cause she doesn‚Äôt understand Spanish and he said i don‚Äôt speak English and he was the host of the party on the microphone doing dance battles with the kids and when the mixed kids dance the crowd wouldn‚Äôt cheer them on and it was very hurtful for the kids it showed the embarrassment and let‚Äôs not forget only Dominican music was played . Only 1 English song played which was the cha cha slide and 1 Afro beat song which was Joanna . But very bad experience speaking from a mixed parent as well .
Mariel is the best
Good environment, music very good food awesome !!!! A great vibe and if Maribel is your waitress she‚Äôs amazing !!!! Highly recommend

Boca Lounge has such a beautiful atmosphere ‚Äî the vibe is just right! The music is always on point, the food is delicious, and the drinks are strong (in the best way). Perfect spot to unwind, catch up with friends, or just enjoy the night. Definitely recommend! Thank you Cynthia

Cynthia is absolutely amazing! She always makes me feel so special every time I come in. She‚Äôs so sweet, attentive, and genuinely cares about her clients. You can tell she loves what she does ‚Äî the experience is always 10/10 because of her! Highly recommend seeing Cynthia if you want to be treated like royalty üíï‚Ä¶

I had the pleasure of being hosted by Cynthia, and I can honestly say she made my experience unforgettable. From the moment I arrived, she was incredibly warm and welcoming, ensuring that every detail was taken care of. Cynthia is not only attentive but goes above and beyond to make sure her guests are comfortable and well taken care of. Her hospitality is unmatched‚Äîwhether it was offering local recommendations or just checking in to see if I needed anything, she made sure I felt like a priority. Highly recommend her if you're looking for someone who truly cares about making your stay amazing!

Mariel is the best waiter her attention is spectacular.
The service wow amazing.

Had  fried calamari and empanada appetizer. Entrees: churrasco steak and garlic shrimp. Steaks and black beans flavorful and shrimp good wish they were jumbo. They have a DJ that comes in later in the evening. Happy hour 4-6 pm decent specials on food and drinks. Would definitely return.
Linda experiencia buena comida en el bar buena atencion el bartender david pendiente todo el tiempo a mis tragos y si todo estaba bien lo recomiendo 100%
The food and drinks in this place is amazing. To top it off Claritza took care of me she does an awesome job with a smile on her face‚Ä¶ her hospitality A1
Great food great service drinks amazing music is a vibe shout out to our waitress Claritza she such a vibe and bilingual go and ask for her
Praxy she's great

I ate here for a friend‚Äôs birthday and I was served by a wonderful server named Cynthia. Everyone seemed to enjoy their food and the drinks we had. The music was nice not to loud where you could hear the person next to you and I would definitely go again.
Mi mesera Marieeeeel la meeejoorrr desde hacen 7 a√±os !!!!! La comida y el ambiente excelentee
mariel was amazing !! super nice ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è il love back just for her!

Great service & good food i highly recommend coming here !

Claritza was the best. She made my sister‚Äôs birthday very fun and special. The food was great and delicious. The atmosphere was nice, fun, and vibrant. And so was the music. The drinks were strong and great and the dessert was delicious. I completely recommend 100%
Claritza was amazing. Best customer service I‚Äôve had in a while. Thank you for great time. Food was great and atmosphere.
Mariel was the best, she was very friendly and funny. The music was great and the food was even better. I definitely recommend 100% The atmosphere was nice and vibrant.
Loved Mariel she was amazing as well as the food and atmosphere.

I went during happy hour and Jessica the bartender was amazing‚Ä¶.she was so helpful and on top of things‚Ä¶..really explained the menu and explained throughly each menu items and gave amazing recommendations. Checked on us and our drinks and food quite often‚Ä¶.overall service was amazing and I would go back again 10out of 10

Mariel was amazing! Her service was top tier! I recommend this lounge!
Me and my best friend had amazing food with great music and fantastic service from Mariel she was so nice and accommodating
Mariel great service and friendly
We came for happy hour ! Music food & drinks are amazing ! Our server Mariel was the best ! 10/10 highly recommend will be coming back !

We come here often and we took friends recently from out of town. I was a bit embarrassed that my friend was very disappointed in the cheesesteak he ordered. Bread was great but the amount of steak was much less than the half pound as indicated on the menu.
Wouldn‚Äôt want any other server than the one and only Ms. Praxy <3 her humor is the best !!!!
It was a pleasant to be serve by Praxy :) the best personality ever

I love the Food. And music and tvs and drinks and I love the artist they had there named TIMTVNYC24HRS  AND THE LADIES LOVE HIM IN THE BRONX ..MAJOR SALUTE TO BOCO IN THE BRONX ... AND ALL WHO GOES ..ENJOy..& ASK FOR TIMTVNYC24HRS ‚ô•Ô∏èGET A FREE HUG #TIMTVNYC24HRS

Wife saw an awesome video showing off the food so we tried it.  Got there just after 4 when they opened so it only had a few tables.  The place is huge with TVs and awesome decor.  The music was definitely my style but not the wifes.  The waitress was great in the begining but never checked up on us after bringing the food.  Not a big deal since we had no issues.  We really liked the food and the prices were not bad.  Drinks were pretty good also.  It started to get busy as it was a Friday and I assume people show up after work because the bar got packed.  We didn't stay much more than an hr or so but we liked it there.  I would come back but only at opening.  I dont think the place would be OK for us the later it got.

Boca was such a great time! The food, service, and atmosphere were all on point. Our server, Mariel, was absolutely amazing so friendly, attentive, and made our experience even better. Everything came out quickly and tasted incredible. Definitely recommend for a brunch or dinner date! When you go ask for her, she‚Äôs amazing!

Hoy, s√°bado 26 de abril de 2025, fui a Boca y una chica muy amable llamada Mariel me atendi√≥. Recib√≠ un excelente servicio y atenci√≥n.

Quiero destacar que pasar√© nuevamente, principalmente por el buen trato que me brind√≥ esa joven.
La comida estuvo muy buena y el servicio en general fue excelente.

Gracias, Mariel, por tu atenci√≥n, y gracias tambi√©n a todos los que me atendieron.
Tengo el nombre de Mariel porque me tom√© el atrevimiento de pregunt√°rselo personalmente. Muchas gracias por ese gran trato.
¬°Definitivamente volver√© otra vez a Boca!
My server Mariel was the best! very attentive, the food, hookah and music are really good. would definitely come back.
Excelente lugar y nuestra mecera Praxy muy amable y atenta. Los precios de su happy hour es muy bueno. Siempre visitamos Boca y ellos siempre nos dan una excelente atenci√≥n.

The Happy Hour food and drinks were good. I like the mango margaritas üçπ üòã.  The service was great, didn't have any problem getting drinks for out table. The only problem I had was with the DJ.  If there is a blended crowd, please try and play all types of music, not just Spanish. The atmosphere üëå is  a good vibe.  All in all, I'll come back and recommend the afterwork hangout spot.

Boca is a vibe! The food was good and the service was better. Our server Mariel was very attentive and accommodating. I recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a calm after work vibe. DJ is cool too he plays a really diverse set. 10/10 recommend ‚≠êÔ∏è

Boca on Webster; should be marketed as strictly a lounge. The food was excellently prepared, though a bit overpriced  and the drinks were unbalanced. Meaning heavy pours on the alcohol. The service was as expected, inattentive and distracted. The music was deafening and I went there at 4 pm. As a lounge only this place would be great. But as a restaurant offering a dinner option, it fails.

Boca is the Bronx hotspot where the drinks hit, the music‚Äôs fire, and the energy? Pure bombshell. From the moment you walk in, it‚Äôs giving villa realness ‚Äî steamy, flirty, unforgettable.

And let‚Äôs talk about our server ‚Äî Mariel. Certified baddie, top-tier service, and sweeter than a first-date kiss under the neon lights. She understood the assignment.

If you‚Äôre not at Boca, what are you even doing?
Love Island called ‚Äî they want their lounge back. üèùÔ∏èüíãüî•

#BocaBaddie #CasaAmorBronx #ServedByMariel

It was my first time coming to Boca and I am very disappointed with my experience. I had reservations at 3:00pm for brunch for a group of 4. We all arrived to boca together at about 2:55pm. We communicated to the host we had reservations for 3:00pm. The host was very rude and said we have to wait a few minutes at the bar because they were seating the big groups first who left deposits. Turns out a few minutes turned into 45 minutes which is absurd when we had reservations and we were a small group.

After waiting the long 45minutes we were finally seated and at the worst area of the restaurant. We were facing a wall and next to the bathroom which was very uncomfortable when the line got long with all of the people passing by and bumping into us. Below I attached photos of when we were waiting at the bar and where we were seated.

The atmosphere here is fun but they need better staffing and organization!

This place is good, the environment is nice and pleasant. The food here is good and the drinks are also good. Happy hour is great, one of the place that begin happy hour at 12pm. The restaurant hours of this place are very enjoyable, but‚Ä¶

Service is Amazing, Ask for Cynthia Once you go, she knows what to recommend, been here twice in 3 days, brunch is popping & so is happy hour & the specials, drinks are strong, food is good & fresh I Absolutely recommend this place üî•üî•Pulluppp
Such a beautiful spot with amazing service and delicious food! The music sets the perfect vibe - definitely a must visit for brunch. Highly recommend! Mariel was such a nice server love her.
Siempre quer√≠a ir hasta que ya fui a celebrar mi cumplea√±os, muy buen ambiente, me encanta la variedad de comida que hay, buen servicio, despu√©s de las 10 cambia el ambiente a discotec.

If you‚Äôve never been here you need to come here , i‚Äôve been here twice already and always recommend it . The food is good , drinks are strong and do the trick ‚Ä¶ plus the hookah is perfect for a cute video and don‚Äôt forget I had an amazing server Mariel , she‚Äôs caring and attentive . COME HERE ASAPPPPP
Love this happy hour spot ! Go twice a week and the service is amazing, our bartenders David and Luis always get us right . Highly recommend

We were seated in the middle despite asking for a different space, only to be rushed through our meals and beverages.

The staff at BOCA  were very rude moving around furniture whilst we were still dining.

The food was just okay at best.  Customer service was extremely poor. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place to my friends.
I love this place , brunch is Amazing . Rum punch be punching . Mariel is the greatest she gonna keep your cup filled .

Took my wife to NYC for Mother‚Äôs Day and a great Brunch Experience! Good Food, Excellent service, Amazing Atmosphere. We arrived 45 minutes late for our reservation and still they made sure we were taken care of, Place was PACKED, we literally stayed all night. The late-night lounge is definitely a PARTY place. Beautiful Staff and great bottle service. From food to drinks to hookah to service. Management made sure multiple times we were satisfied. We stayed in Times Square but had no problems traveling to the Bronx for BOCA. We will be back again for sure! üëçüèΩüôåüèΩ Make sure you put this NYC Gem on your bucket list!

Weather is after work shenanigans, brunch or night life, service is outstanding, food is so good, you will want to come back. Happy hour ends at 10pm!!!! One of my favorite spots in the bronx and between Luis and David, can't pick my favorite bar tender, both very attentive and friendly.  Iove it!!! A MUST check it out. üòéü•∞

My friends and I always come here and have such amazing service. Our favorite servers being Claritza and Praxy. We absolutely adore them so much. On top of that, the manager, Evelyn, was absolutely amazing at accommodating us and make sure we are comfortable after a small mishap. The food is amazing. Happy hour is amazing. It‚Äôs honestly our favorite spot to be after work on Fridays and we will continue to come back ü©µ
The food was delicious. The place is super clean n the service was great. I would recommend this place.
Great service, Mariel very nice and friendly. Great drinks and food

With an electrifying ambiance filled with luminescent colors, this spot has the potential to become something special. Savory bites: wings, ribs and tacos. Happy hour drink specials like margaritas, beers and tequila shots will keep your‚Ä¶

I went for my 24th birthday on a sunday and it was amazing! we had a ball! there was 21 of us and the service was amazing. they didn‚Äôt get anything wrong and was on point with the drinks and the servings. it was 62 per person with everything included for the brunch! our server mariel was amazing she was always around and was on point with getting our drinks and food and checking in on us! the spot had good music playing and the dj was good. it was nice and packed! we ended up staying and getting a bottle and hookah!

We drove 2 hours from Connecticut after seeing videos of what looked like amazing food from this restaurant. Before making the trip, we confirmed multiple times with the host that the full menu would be available. She assured us 100% that it would be.

However, when we arrived, we were told the main menu wasn‚Äôt available and that our only option was to order from the brunch menu. No one in our party drinks, and the brunch menu didn‚Äôt offer the items we came for‚Äîso we decided to leave without ordering anything.

We were also asked to Zelle $10 per person just to reserve a table since our group had more than 5 people, which already felt sketchy. But we took the risk because we were excited about the food.

Customer service was terrible throughout the experience. The manager was just as unprofessional as the staff, which made sense in hindsight. After we left, the owner called and promised that we‚Äôd receive a refund first thing the next morning‚Äîbut now it‚Äôs well past noon, and still nothing. They even blocked my number.

The whole experience was incredibly disappointing, unprofessional, and frankly, a waste of time and money.
my server was maria and she was very nice and helpful and was taking care of us the whole time. $45 appetizers and dinner and bottomless drinks! what a deal!

I was referred to come here for mothers day. I brought my party on time and ready to be seated. They had just opened & the place was empty, out of all the empty tables they wanted to sit us in the dark corner in an uncomfortable section next to the kitchen/ garbage bins. I asked if we can be seated in the middle or upstairs & they gave us the meanest attitude, they explained all the other tables are reserved. They insinuated that if I wanted to be seated elsewhere I would have to pay extra‚Ä¶ When I‚Äôve already paid for my reservation two weeks prior. Again the place was empty, it was early and the other reservations were three hours later.. My family & I was trying to reason with them & when we spoke with the manager, she was dismissive. I‚Äôve been to higher class restaurants with reservations & they freely allow you to switch where you would like to be seated without the nonsense.

They didn‚Äôt give me my refund for the reservation, even though it wasn‚Äôt stated that it was non-refundable. Another overhyped hoochie restaurant. The staff was miserable and tried to ruin a great day.

Talk about a turn up! Went to Boca last week and had amazing drinks thanks to Cynthia took care of me and my friends told her I would make sure me and all my friends left a review cause she was that good! Can‚Äôt wait to go back
This place has great service along with wonderful bartenders. The drinks are awesome as well as the food. I cannot wait to return for the lounge and brunch experience ü©∑
David and Luis at the bar are so lovely! We came to celebrate our friends graduation and they were so hospitable and accommodating. DJ was on point too! Will return! Thanks for a good night!
Had a very fun experience here at Boca Lounge. Mariel was my hostess for the night and she was very kind and friendly! I would definitely come here again. The food and vibe is outstanding!!
I love going to Boca lounge to party whenever you go please request for Mariel she was an amazing server. The music was great and the food was amazing ! Highly recommend.

Boca is a local designation in the Bronx at the hub. Happy hour Monday thru Friday until late, unlike most places. Service and food is great. Depending on the day of the week or a holiday it can get super busy. Sip on your cocktail enjoy the music, and the food is worth waiting for.
I came out with my coworkers for brunch and had the best time ! Cynthia was our waitresses and made sure the drinks kept coming! great vibes good food, awesome service!

Had a date night here with my boyfriend. Got the appetizer platter(the wings were a little over done not much meat on them, and the chicken croquettes were a little dry but everything else was good! And the octopus appetizer was really good. We got a few other dishes that were good and the Webster cocktail was good (:! Had some guy singing who was really good also! .. we went in on a random night and it wasn‚Äôt busy so not sure how it is when it‚Äôs busy on the weekends, but overall we enjoyed our date night <3
